testimonialsList.name: John Doe
testimonialsList.comment: I love using GoCabNow! The service is quick, reliable, and the drivers are always friendly.

testimonialsList.name: Jane Smith
testimonialsList.comment: Booking a ride with GoCabNow is so convenient. The app is user-friendly, and the drivers are professional.

testimonialsList.name: Bob Johnson
testimonialsList.comment: I appreciate the 24/7 customer support. It gives me peace of mind knowing help is just a call away.
